TopicTitle: It's that time again, it's Kerbal Show Feedback time.

Articles.Content:
It's that time of the week, and i've got all sorts of new things to show off.

FIRST: i modeled the base of the trucks seen swerving around the VAB and SPH

(kerbal for scale)

So... yeah.

SECOND: Working on stuff IRL. MIGHT or MIGHT NOT be posting this weekend. if i don't post this weekend, next week's will be about 1-3 minutes longer... because... reasons.

THIRD: also working on interior views for the VAB and whatnot.

Oh well no wonder people aren't responding.

Yes, you may reply to this thread.

also, here's the truck in action.
I hate those trucks in the hangar to be honest mate, they keep driving through my work area and annoying the crap out of me, not a welcome addition here :/

I hate those trucks in the hangar to be honest mate, they keep driving through my work area and annoying the crap out of me, not a welcome addition here :/

Devo... Have a snickers.

Anyway... yeah... i've been working on stuff! HOPEFULLY i'll get something out this week.
